resources.string: By pressing the Start button, you agree to the Soul Browser\n%1$s and %2$s.
If the number of downloads exceeds the limit, it will be queued.
Live video may not be downloaded.
If a translatable language is detected, it will be translated.
If a translatable language is detected, a translate button is displayed.
Block automatic translations on the current site
Block automatic translations on the current page
You can register sites that do not use automatic translation.
Translator cannot be run according to site policy.
Number of retries in case of connection failure
Removes elements that appear above the screen of a web page.
Although primarily advertising, non-advertising elements may also be removed.
It is applied very lightly so that non-advertising elements are not removed.
Check only when the page changes.
Block when other sites are opened (including advertising sites)
Block only popups that are suspected as ads
Block the site from running other apps.
If site information is available, open the site.
The site is trying to run another app.
If too many tabs are open, the browser may slow down.
Do you want to save your password?
Stores passwords in normal mode and incognito mode separately.
Please set up a lock screen first.
Resetting will delete all data associated with the password.
The lock screen will launch before logging in with the saved password.
Files created during web browsing (e.g. images)
Information created during web browsing (e.g. login information)
Scroll web pages with volume keys
Back button twice to app exit
If you click the back button on the last page of the tab, it is notified that it is the last page of the tab.
This is the last page of the tab.
Swipe the page from the last page to close the tab
Previous button behavior on last page
The best size for the current type
If displayed image is larger than screen
If image width is longer than height
If you want faster performance, disable this option.
Permission denied or app not installed.
Always keep in mind the copyright.
Using a copyrighted work without permission from the copyright owner is a copyright infringement. You are responsible for all copyright infringement.
If you have any questions about copyright, please contact the site.
Please be careful when using it.
Do not show this message again
Please put the QR code or barcode inside the guide line.
No QR code or barcode found in the image.
This site requests the following permission
\'Notification permission\' is required for status notifications for the features below.
At least one filter must be active to block ads.
You can register sites where ads are allowed.
You can register sites where overlays are allowed.
You can register sites where popups are allowed.
Select items to delete when app exits
When the app is closed, the selected item is deleted.
A reset will delete all blocked links.
Do you want to reset settings?
Settings related to the functions below are not initialized.
This feature is not supported for this video.
Rotating the screen may exit the PIP mode.\nDifferent sites have different behavior.
The advertisement is not ready yet.\nPlease try again later.
2. You can remove it by clicking the icon.
Swipe left and right with two fingers to move tab.
Swipe down with two fingers to remove tab.
Create an album shortcut button on the home screen.
Create a TV cast shortcut button on the home screen.
Visit the site with the image.
Select \'View only images\' or \'Save all images\'.
Select the TV cast list icon.
Visit the site with the video.
When a video is detected, a download button appears on the screen.
Button do not appear for video that can not be downloaded.
Some sites need to play the video before the video is detected.\nDifferent sites have different behavior.
Due to YouTube policy, YouTube videos can not be downloaded.
Play downloadable videos with video player.
Videos that do not allow external playback on the site cannot be played.
Downloading too many files at the same time can slow device and cause problems.
History will not be saved.\nAll previously saved records will be deleted.
Records older than the retention period are automatically deleted.
All your history is saved.\nToo much data can slow browser performance.
Lock screen for unlocking touch during video playback.
Switch to PIP with home key
Separately manage data such as cookies and cache.
With this option, the app will always start in normal mode.
Disable this option to use incognito mode by default.
Save history in incognito mode. History in incognito mode does not appear in normal mode.
Save download history in incognito mode. Download history in incognito mode does not appear in normal mode.
Resetting will delete all data in incognito mode.
If you forget your password and initialize the lock screen, the selected data will be deleted.
Only incognito mode data is deleted.
There is no bookmark in the HTML.
There is no shortcut in normal mode.
There is no bookmark in normal mode.
There is no history in normal mode.
There is no password in normal mode.
Incognito tabs are retained when you change to normal mode.
Incognito mode login information is retained when you change to normal mode.
Please provide the address of the site where the video can not be downloaded.
Please provide the address of the site that is having problems with the dark theme.
Open YouTube link in new tab
Due to YouTube policy, YouTube background playback is not supported.
The font is applied to this text.
You can change the font of web pages with TTF files in internal storage or SD card.
Each font has a set of supported languages.
Most fonts usually only support alphabets and numbers.
Check the preview to see if the selected font supports the specific language.
Touch to cast media to your TV
If a Chromecast is detected, an icon will appear at the top of the screen.
Click the icon to connect your Chromecast.
* It may take some time to detect your Chromecast.
Click the play icon in the download popup to stream it to your TV.
As of Android 10, the \'Scoped Storage\' policy applies.
Save list and save path have been initialized.
There are no files to add.
Press and hold the list to change to edit mode.
You can change the position by dragging the right arrow.
Please copy the link and put it directly.
When you click the text displayed in the browser, it is read by voice.
When text is clicked, it is read by voice.
Supported languages depend on the TTS engine being used.
TTS engine can be changed in device settings.
TTS runs automatically when reader mode is started.
Appears on the screen while the voice is playing.
You can move by pressing and holding the button.
Drag the screen left or right to navigate the screen.
Drag the area on the left side of the screen to change the brightness.
Drag the area on the right side of the screen to change the volume.
Allows the site to store or read cookies.
Some sites may not function properly if you do not accept cookies.
Some browser features will not work if JavaScript is disabled.
2. You can change it by clicking the icon.
You can set the function to use when you press and hold the icon on the bottom bar.
You can set the function to use when swiping up the icon on the bottom bar.
You can register frequently used sentences.
Close other tabs within the group
Click on the homepage icon to close all tabs
There is no body content on this page.
If the site you visit supports themes, it applies to browser.
1. Click the area to change the function.
2. Drag the area to change the size.
On devices with display cutouts, content is rendered into the cutout area.
1. Displays the page loaded so far.
2. Displays the page within the available memory limit.
Estimated and actual sizes may vary.
You can set landscape mode and portrait mode differently.
To set landscape mode, rotate your device horizontally.
Some sites may not be supported.
It may not be supported in all regions.
You need to restart the app.
Switch between first and last tab
Block JavaScript on the current site
Block JavaScript on the current page
You can register sites that block JavaScript.
Setting the wallpaper will always set the homepage to a dark theme.
Accumulation of stale data can slow down your browser.\nIt is a good idea to clean up your data periodically.
One payment will remove in-app ads forever.
It is always valid if the account used for payment is the same.
In-app ads and website ads are different.
Website ads removal feature is free.
In-app ads are ads displayed by apps.
Soul Browser\'s in-app ads don\'t bother you.
It only appears in very limited locations.
Soul Browser\'s goal is to provide convenience and comfort to its users.
Website ads are advertisements displayed by website administrators.
It has nothing to do with Soul Browser.
Soul Browser does not display in-app ads on websites.
All features of Soul Browser are free.
Please help keep Soul Browser free.
Thank you for using Soul Browser.
An error has occurred.\nPlease try again later.
This may not apply if automatic lighting is activated.
Put the subtitle file in the same folder as the video file.
The video file and subtitle file must have the same name.
The loading speed of VTT format is faster.
If the encoding is not UTF-8, characters may not be displayed normally.
By default it connects with HTTPS.\nSites that do not support HTTPS may not be able to connect.
It cannot be run on HTTP sites (unsecured sites).
When you tap the home icon
You can block more ads by adding filters.
If there is a problem with the filter, the page may not be displayed normally.
When an SSL error occurs, the page automatically goes to a safe page.
If you have too many pages open, your browser may be slow.
The memory used for page composition is automatically deleted when the app is closed.
When the limit is exceeded, the first item is automatically deleted.
You can use your favorite downloader app as a download manager.
You can surf the web faster by separating your browser and downloads.
It does not save what you type on the keyboard.
Some keyboards may not be supported.
The user can\'t authenticate because the hardware is unavailable. Try again later.
The user can\'t authenticate because no fingerprint is enrolled.
The user can\'t authenticate because there is no suitable hardware.
The user can\'t authenticate because a security vulnerability has been discovered with one or more hardware sensors.
The user can\'t authenticate because the specified options are incompatible with the current Android version.
Unable to determine whether the user can authenticate.
Block gestures on the current site
Block gestures on the current page
You can register sites that do not use gestures.
Applies only to gestures in the center of the screen.
It does not apply to gestures at the edges of the screen.
The effectiveness of this feature depends on the sites you visit frequently.
If there is no difference between before and after enabling this feature, we recommend disabling it to save memory.
Make your browser faster with memory management that\'s right for you.
1. You can move by pressing and holding the icon.
2. You can create folders by overlapping icons.
They are automatically grouped when a new window opens on the site.
1. You can move by pressing and holding the tab.
2. You can create folders by overlapping tabs.
If it\'s not what you want, you can edit it yourself.
Show tab position and number of tabs on tab button
To remove the top bar, delete all icons from the top bar.
The backup file format has changed.
Backup files from previous versions are no longer supported.
Please create a new backup file.
Spaces are not visible on the running screen.
You can change the position by dragging the subtitles.
If the file is encrypted, it cannot be played.
Sometimes when you download a file, the overall size of the file keeps changing.
This is because this is the estimated size of the file, not the actual size of the file.
There is no difference in the download results.
There was a problem displaying the webpage.
If you see this screen often, check the following features.
Disable Google AMP in Google search results.
Ad blocking is based on filters.
If you have a site that doesn\'t block ads, add an appropriate filter.
Adding too many filters can slow down browser.
Find the combination that\'s right for you.
The recommended combination is the basic filter and the language filter.
If the provided filter does not block ads, please add your own filter rule or contact filter administrator.
Filter copyright remains with the filter creator or filter supplier.
Soul Browser has no rights to filter files.
Thanks to the creators of the filter.
Filters may not be updated if the filter address changes.
In this case, please inform the developer.
Thanks to the open source developers. ‚ù§
The selected item cannot be disabled.
To disable it, select another one first.
Press and hold the screen to reveal function buttons.
You can change it in settings.
If the Android system webview is not the latest version, the dark theme may not be displayed normally.
Save recent searches in incognito mode
Are you sure you want to delete all recent searches?
Are you sure you want to delete all recent records?
